title: shakthiyai vaNangiDuvOm
sahitya:
shaktiyai vaNangiDuvOm Om jaya shaktiyai vaNangiDuvOm



anupallavi



shuddha sutantira jyOti parAmbikai



caraNam 1



nin malar nenjinilE vIra neruppenap-paLicciDuvAL avaL

ponnaDi shUDiDuvOm Om annai pugazhinaip-pADiDuvOm jaya   



caraNam 2



tOL vali mighattaruvAL anbar tuyarkedat-tuNai varuvAL avaL

tAL paNindEttiDuvOm deivat-tAi nammaik-kAttiDuvAL jaya



caraNam 3



accattai ozhittiDuvOm shakti aruLinil kuLittiDuvOm

uccamAi-pADiDuvOm tUya uLLattir-kUTTiDuvOm parA
